name: AlphaPay Payment Plugin for WeChat Pay, Alipay, UnionPay, and Credit Card All-in-One Payment（微信支付，支付宝，银联，信用卡支付）
author: AlphaPay

sections.description:
Accept every payment on one platform

AlphaPay is the Chinese payment service provider of Alipay, WeChat Pay, and UnionPay that specializes in cross-border POS & mobile payment technology.

We are dedicated to providing a safe and convenient RMB cross-border payment platform for Chinese shoppers and Canadian businesses. We offer solutions for all-size businesses in a variety of industries ranging from Retail, Supermarket, e-Commerce, Hotel, Food & Beverage, Transportation, Entertainment, Education, etc.

AlphaPay strives to provide the most secure and convenient payment solution in one single platform for merchants to expand their businesses by accepting global payments. Merchants can connect to all the mainstream payment channels like WeChat Pay, Alipay, UnionPay, Visa, and MasterCard upon single activation with AlphaPay.

More information is on AlphaPay Website and contact us to get your account ready.

WooCommerce Live Demo

Go to our Live Demo.

Features

  • Support WeChat Pay, Alipay, UnionPay, and Credit Card.
  • Currency accepts CAD and USD.
  • Customers make payments with mobile wallets and bank cards.
  • Daily transaction Details, User Analysis, and Payment Notifications.
  • Real-time currency exchange rate.
sections.installation:
• In WordPress -> Plugins menu, click “Add New”. In the search field, search by “AlphaPay – WeChat Pay, Alipay & UnionPay for WooCommerce”.
  • Install and activate the plugin.
  • Go to AlphaPay’ Website and apply a merchant account.
  • After receive account information, you should enter Partner Code and Gateway Credential.
  • Enable WeChat Pay, Alipay and UnionPay.
sections.faq:
The order showing on WooCommerce is not paid, but the customer has already paid with WeChat Pay, Alipay or UnionPay. Where should I check the order status?

  1. Login the AlphaPay Dashboard with your Login ID and password.
  2. In WooCommerce Order Details, find the alphapay_order_id and copy this number.
  3. In AlphaPay BackOffice, search the order_id you found in WooCommerce Order Details and check the order status.
  4. If Pay Success in AlphaPay BackOffice, change the order status in WooCommerce.

If you need more help, contact us 1-855-937-7888

Does this require an SSL certificate?

Yes! an SSL certificate must be installed on your site to use AlphaPay (WeChat Pay, Alipay and UnionPay) which make sure payment complete under secure circumstance.
